name: Mankind Defender (itch)
description:
You are the chosen one and you must confront countless hordes of bloodthirsty monsters. Endless waves of enemies threaten humanity and only you can stop the foul beasts. You must go to various places of the world to kill all enemies. Travel to the deepest caves, the highest peaks, the most blood-curling cemeteries and even reach into the depths of hell. You have only one goal - to stop the fiend who brought this evil to the Earth. Improve both your equipment and your stats to survive raging battle. Alas, Adventurer! Grab your gear and prove your worth on the battlefield!

Features:

  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Colorful arenas
  • Statistics and equipment upgrade system
  • Multiple enemies
  • Powerfull bosses with different tactics

Minimum system requirements:

  • Processor:   Intel Core i3
  • RAM:   2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk:   2 GB available space
  • Video Card:   GeForce 6600
  • Supported OS:   Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 7
